thread.title: Uppukaruvadu audio on October 11
thread.title_full: Uppukaruvadu audio on October 11 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Uppukaruvadu audio on October 11
text:
The musical launch of Uppu karuvadu will happen on October 11th as officially announced. "We are extremely delighted with the outcome of the film. The 'U' certificate was a great boost to us. Director Radha Mohan's films have always got good music," says Ramji Narasimhan of First Copy Pictures in a press release.
He adds, "In Uppu Karuvadu , we have provided platform to debutant music director Steve Watz, a popular guitarist to prove his credentials as a music director. He, in turn, has proved it too with some sensible music. We are launching the music on 11th October and the event will be a perfect launchpad towards the release.
